reviewTitle: Très agréable, gentils et bons conseils
review_details:
Nous avons passé 1 semaine début septembre en couple à Delmar, et les 2 personnes qui sont à la reception nous ont très bien accueillis et très bien conseillés pour nos activités ou lieux à voir pendant notre séjour.
Tous les contacts et conseils qu'elles nous ont donné étaient de très bonne qualité. notre favori était sans aucun doute le bateau de pêche. La chambre était très agréable, mon amie a adoré le confort du lit et donc très bien dormi, nous avions la grande suite no1 je crois. Merci
simply very good, the owner is serving himself and we can see that he's doing his best every moment, very good quality, very good service. We had to book to have a table

reviewTitle: best day in greece with them, authentic and very kind
review_details: Genuine, Authentic, we loved every moment in this day, felt like being part of a family. The best fish soup of our lives, no kidding. And the smile and kindness of these people is the only thing hotter than the sun. To see the nets and the fishes inside, was very interesting, we went to beautiful beaches, and had very nice food. You can sit comfortably on the boat, not like on other cruise boats . We were only 8 ppl, so that was awesome. We hesitated to come back 1 day later. ....A lot of love in this boat...
